textBox.richText: Today I’m proud to release AVbin 10! This is by far the best release I have ever put together. You can go get in now from the download page. AVbin 10 Highlights - Better performance! - No known unaddressed bugs! - Ogg files now report proper timestamps again! (Fixes pyglet being unable to .seek() with an .ogg sound source) - Based off of the Libav trunk as of 22 Aug 2012 (yesterday!) - Binary installers for everyone! Instead of tarballs and zipfiles, we now have binary installers for all six platforms. - New functions: avbin_get_info(), avbin_init_options() - example/avbin_dump.c updated - Multithreading support - ...and more! See the full release notes.
